    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2237</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dispersion of white light through a prism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zerstreuung des weißen Lichtes durch ein Prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dispersion de la lumière blanche par un prisme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dispersão da luz branca através de um prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dispersione di luce bianca attraverso un prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διασπορά του άσπρου φωτός μέσω ενός πρίσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dispersión de la luz blanca a través de un 
prisma</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A aimple animation which demonstrates the dispersion of white light passing through a prism, into the colors of the rainbow</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine aimple Animation, die die Zerstreuung des 
weißen Lichtes überschreiten durch ein Prisma zeigt, in die Farben 
des Regenbogens</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation d'aimple qui démontre la 
dispersion de la lumière blanche passant par un prisme, dans les 
couleurs de l'arc-en-ciel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation do aimple que demonstre a dispersão
da luz branca que passa através de um prisma, nas cores do 
arco-íris</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione del aimple che dimostra la 
dispersione di luce bianca che passa attraverso un prisma, nei colori 
del Rainbow</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα aimple που καταδεικνύει τη διασπορά 
του άσπρου φωτός που περνά μέσω ενός πρίσματος, στα χρώματα του
ουράνιου τόξου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación del aimple que demuestra la 
dispersión de la luz blanca que pasa a través de un prisma, en los 
colores del arco iris</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
